about.subheading: Tradition and Innovation for Over 20 Years
about.p1: Serralharia Casal, founded over 20 years ago, is currently located in the parish of Aldreu, in the municipality of Barcelos.
about.p2: Our employees are professional, experienced, and skilled. We carry out work in aluminum, iron, and stainless steel. We manufacture all types of aluminum and stainless steel frames, metal structures, safety grilles, sandwich panel roofing, sectional gates, and all automation for proper operation.
